tool_description: The Philosophers API provides information about notable philosophers, including their philosophies and historical contexts. It is suitable for applications focused on philosophy, history, or culture.

api_list.name: Random Philosopher
api_list.description: Returns information of a random philosopher.

api_list.name: Search Philosopher By Name
api_list.description: Search for a philosopher by their name.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the philosopher to search for.
